entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 8:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 10 km

Dewpoint: -2.1°C

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
